charges.charge_description: Knowingly, willfully, unlawfully, and with felonious intent, by force and violence and by intimidation, did take from the person and presence of Eva Hudson a sum of US currency exceeding $100 belonging to and in the care, custody, control and management and possession of the Wachovia Bank, 2939 Village Drive, Fayetteville, North Carolina, the deposits of which were then insured by the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation. During the robbery, the defendant did put in jeopardy the life of Eva Hudson by use of a dangerous weapon, to wit a razor blade box cutter and the threat of a dangerous weapon, to wit: a gun in violation of 18 USC, Sec 2113(a) and (d)
